import os
import win32com.client as win32
import pythoncom

pythoncom.CoInitialize\(\)

print\(''한글 프로그램 연결 중...''\)
hwp = win32.Dispatch\(''HWPFrame.HwpObject''\)
hwp.RegisterModule\(''FilePathCheckDLL'', ''FilePathCheckerModule''\)
print\(''연결됨!''\)

base_dir = r''C:\\Users\\user\\wiki-site\\public\\files\\forms''

# 7종 파일 변환
print\(''\\n[1] 표준근로계약서-7종 변환''\)
hwp_file = os.path.join\(base_dir, ''표준근로계약서-7종.hwp''\)
pdf_file = os.path.join\(base_dir, ''표준근로계약서-7종.pdf''\)

hwp.Open\(hwp_file, ''HWP'', ''forceopen:true''\)
hwp.SaveAs\(pdf_file, ''PDF''\)
print\(f''    PDF: {os.path.exists\(pdf_file\)}''\)
hwp.Clear\(1\)

# DOCX 변환 시도 \(DOC 형식으로\)
print\(''\\n[2] DOCX 변환 시도''\)
files = [''표준근로계약서'', ''단시간근로계약서'', ''표준근로계약서-7종'']

for name in files:
    hwp_file = os.path.join\(base_dir, f''{name}.hwp''\)
    doc_file = os.path.join\(base_dir, f''{name}.doc''\)
    
    print\(f''    {name}...''\)
    hwp.Open\(hwp_file, ''HWP'', ''forceopen:true''\)
    
    # DOC 형식으로 저장 시도
    try:
        # 방법 1: SaveAs with DOC
        hwp.SaveAs\(doc_file, ''DOC''\)
        if os.path.exists\(doc_file\):
            print\(f''      DOC 저장 성공!''\)
    except Exception as e:
        print\(f''      DOC 저장 실패: {e}''\)
    
    hwp.Clear\(1\)

hwp.Quit\(\)
pythoncom.CoUninitialize\(\)
print\(''\\n완료!''\)
")
